attributes.action: Create an offence of attempted murder through the negligent or reckless use of motor vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the shameful sentence of 8 years for the murderer of two members of the Proctor family on the M62 it is time for change. The people are fed up with those who recklessly and knowingly drive vehicles while unfit, or who drive in a manner likely to cause an accident, and yet face no responsibilty for hurling a ton or more of metal at innocent road users. If a person can commit murder by punching innocent passers-by whilst drunk, why are they not guilty of the same offence while sat in a vehicle?
